text: 12:27 1 Ning 10:4-7; 2 Mi 9:3-6 Lamlakki leirangsingna karamna houriba, nakhoi wakhal tou. Makhoina thabaksu sude aduga makhoi masagidamak phisu sade. Adubu eina nakhoida hairi, Solomonmaknasu mahakki matik mangal pumnamakka loinana phijet leitenglabasu leising asigi maraktagi amana phajaba adugumna phijet leitengkhide.
